name: Inquisitor Car
description:
In times of peace, evil infiltrates society in the form of infernal agents to maintain its presence. You know the truth and tried to warn everyone. They laughed at you. They called you crazy. Time is up and evil came to silence you. Stop talking. Start killing evil.

Controls:

W, A, S, D: Movement

Aim with mouse cursor

Left click: Fire weapon

R: Reload

Right click: Use scan beam to detect demons

1: Handgun

2: Bazooka
